def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes")
from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.FluxoCaixa.Utils import FuncoesUtilsFluxo
registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return
ativo = registro.Fields["ATIVO"] == True tipoFluxo = int(registro.Fields["TIPO"].Value)
widget.View.Commands["CMD_INATIVAR"].Visible = ativo widget.View.Commands["CMD_ATIVAR"].Visible = not ativo widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = ativo widget.View.Commands["CMD_PROJETAR"].Visible = tipoFluxo == 3 and not registro.IsCreating widget.View.Commands["CMD_REGRASPROJECAO"].Visible = tipoFluxo == 3 and not registro.IsCreating widget.View.Commands["CMD_COPIAR"].Visible = tipoFluxo == 3 and not registro.IsCreating
widget.View.FieldDefinitions["VALORREFERENCIA"].Visible = tipoFluxo == 3
if (registro.State == EntityState.Read): widget.View.FieldDefinitions["SELECIONARGRUPOS"].Visible = False
if (registro.Fields["MOEDA"].Handle.IsValid()): if (FuncoesUtilsFluxo.MoedaSelecionadaDiferenteDeReal(registro.Fields["MOEDA"].Handle)): widget.View.FieldDefinitions["VALORCOTACAOMOEDA"].Visible = True else: widget.View.FieldDefinitions["VALORCOTACAOMOEDA"].Visible = False else: widget.View.FieldDefinitions["VALORCOTACAOMOEDA"].Visible = False
